column4: hello, i have a cd with an autorun from windows, it has 2 files that i think are used to autorun it auto.bat and autorun.inf, when i click on them i have the choice to run them but if i put run nothing will happen
the inf is only the info what should run, and *.bat files are windows Batch files... they won't run under linux... but I dont know what else is on the CD you can browse the CD
